price: 他警告你们说：‘当你们死后，已变为尘埃和朽骨时，必定要被复活’吗？
arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ إِذَا مِتُّمۡ وَكُنتُمۡ تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: ayaʿidukum annakum idhā mittum wakuntum turāban waʿiẓāman annakum mukh'rajūna
